titles.title: A bill for the relief of Nadezda Shestakova.
A bill for the relief of Nadezda Shestakova.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Declares Nadezda Shestakova to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act upon payment of the required visa fees.
